channel.title: ~~~~~~~~ the gonnascape project!~~~~~~~~~~~
channel.description:
As some of you might know i am Danno owner and creator of Gonnascape v.5 and you might aswell know i was going to make a P2P and you all thought that was a good idea but there was a little missmastake the other day witch we hade a little reset and you might have lost about 6 of you'r level's the Gonnascape team are very sorry for this and we can promiss this will not happen again so we are relesing the P2P [size=20pt]but![/size] it will not BE a P2P it will be a F2P seem's of the big crash.. we will need a few tester's a few client coder's a few webclient coder's and a website coder
-We will alway's liten to you people and take idea's from you! -Max players now 300! as you know people we have held a max of 120 players with no lagg before now and we hade good fun!!
-features for updating-
-barrows -duel arena -Rares are RARE ( they are beging to be on the gonnascape v.5 now! ) -Brilliant shopping place -Working specials -working mage arena -jad -adminzone+modzone -skills-
-attack -strength -defense -prayer -ranged -magic -cooking -fishing -agility -smithing -mining -farming -herblore -runecrafting -slayer -crafting -woodcutting
----------------------------------------------------- ~tester application~ -will you be there for tests?- -how many hours do you play moparscape a day?- -age?- -country?- -will you be there for EVERY test?- -will you be kind?- -will you be in time for pictures?- ------------------------------------------------------ ~CLIENT~ -Will you be loyel?- -how many hours do you play moparscape a day?- -will you be kind?- -will you be in time for pictures?- ------------------------------------------------------- ~WEBSITE~ -Will you be loyel?- -how many hours do you play moparscape a day?- -will you be kind?- -will you be in time for pictures?- ------------------------------------------------------- ~WEBSITE~ -Will you be loyel?- -how many hours do you play moparscape a day?- -will you be kind?- -will you be in time for pictures?- -------------------------------------------------------
I only pick people who I can trust for these places
-TESTERS - - - - - - - -
-client coder's - - - - - -
-webclient codings - - - - - - - - - -
-website designer - - - - - - - - -
RELEASED DATE! 20/08/07 - 01/09/07
thanks! and i hope you wil all join!
wales 00 ~danno~[br][size=1]Posted on: August 04, 2007, 07:01:05 AM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: ~~~~~~~~ the gonnascape project!~~~~~~~~~~~
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

I’ll apply for two, i dont mind which.

-will you be there for tests?- no
-how many hours do you play moparscape a day?- i cant get on much, maybe 1 or 2
-age?- 10
-country?- Americas
-will you be there for EVERY test?- Yes
-will you be kind?- No
-will you be in time for pictures?- Yes

~WEBSITE~
-Will you be loyel?- No
-how many hours do you play moparscape a day?- i can get on quite alot, maybe 6 or 7
-will you be kind?- No
-will you be in time for pictures?- Yes

item.title: ~~~~~~~~ the gonnascape project!~~~~~~~~~~~
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

As some of you might know i am Danno owner and creator of Gonnascape v.5
and you might aswell know i was going to make a P2P
and you all thought that was a good idea
but there was a little missmastake the other day witch we hade a little reset and you might have lost about 6 of you’r level’s
the Gonnascape team are very sorry for this and we can promiss this will not happen again
so we are relesing the P2P [size=20pt]but![/size] it will not BE a P2P it will be a F2P seem’s of the big crash…
we will need a few tester’s
a few client coder’s
a few webclient coder’s
and a website coder

-We will alway’s liten to you people and take idea’s from you!
-Max players now 300! as you know people we have held a max of 120 players with no lagg before now and we hade good fun!!

-features for updating-

-barrows
-duel arena
-Rares are RARE ( they are beging to be on the gonnascape v.5 now! )
-Brilliant shopping place
-Working specials
-working mage arena
-jad
-adminzone+modzone
-skills-

-attack
-strength
-defense
-prayer
-ranged
-magic
-cooking
-fishing
-agility
-smithing
-mining
-farming
-herblore
-runecrafting
-slayer
-crafting
-woodcutting

~tester application~
-will you be there for tests?-
-how many hours do you play moparscape a day?-
-age?-
-country?-
-will you be there for EVERY test?-
-will you be kind?-
-will you be in time for pictures?-

~CLIENT~
-Will you be loyel?-
-how many hours do you play moparscape a day?-
-will you be kind?-
-will you be in time for pictures?-

~WEBSITE~
-Will you be loyel?-
-how many hours do you play moparscape a day?-
-will you be kind?-
-will you be in time for pictures?-

~WEBSITE~
-Will you be loyel?-
-how many hours do you play moparscape a day?-
-will you be kind?-
-will you be in time for pictures?-

I only pick people who I can trust for these places

-TESTERS

-client coder’s

-webclient codings

-website designer

RELEASED DATE! 20/08/07 - 01/09/07

thanks! and i hope you wil all join!

wales 00
